about.text: Kasia was born on 26 October 1989, she doesnt feel old
about.note: Her personal philosophy is that each year brings a new version, not old age.

about.text: Kasia lives in Italy, in Piemont region
about.note: She moved to Italy in 2022 and lives in Piedmont, a region in Northern Italy.

about.text: Kasia is Polish, was born in Pszczyna
Kasia is from the city of Mysłowice in Silesia, Poland from where famous band Myslovitz comes
about.note: The band Myslovitz is known for their song 'Dla Ciebie'. See: https://youtu.be/SuUZMMhARBA?si=d27w7_MXGspxJYMT

about.text: Kasia likes movies, every type and she is not affraid of horrors
about.note: She’s a huge movie lover – all genres, no fear of horror films.
Her first car was a Fiat Panda

about.text: Kasia's first car was Fiat Panda
about.note: She learned to drive with this car.

about.text: Kasia doesn't have animals but one day she may have golden retriever
about.note: She’d love to adopt a golden retriever someday.
They are her go-to healthy snack.
She moved shortly before her wedding and adapted to Italian culture.
But it may change depending on the weather.

education.title: Master of Arts in Scientific Information and Library Science
Bachelor of Arts in Scientific Information and Library Science

Tea: Choosing the right tea based on mood
Knowledge of less common tea types
I know some fun facts about tea, like where lapsang tea comes from
Guitar: Songs I can play: Simple Man (Lynyrd Skynyrd), Knockin' On Heaven's Door
Astronomy: Can identify the Big Dipper and Cassiopeia in the night sky
I know there's a large nebula near Orion
I know that Europa is a moon of Jupiter
I know there's water on Europa
I can tell the difference between a star and a planet at night
Literature: Experimenting with writing novels and poetry
Technology: Once replaced a CPU radiator myself
Cooking: I love and know how to cook
I keep and feed my own sourdough starter
Gardening: I've grown tomatoes, cucumbers, raspberries, strawberries, thyme, sage, rosemary, mint, avocado, onion
I have my own small garden
I can grow plants from seed
Art: Creative writing – created and maintained my own blog
Music: Know music theory and how to read neumes
Know vocal ranges and how to identify them
Travel: I enjoy meeting people and talking to strangers
Kasia has been in Jordania and visited Petra
Kasia visited Wadi-Rum desert in Jordania
Kasia visited London, Barcelona, Valencia, New York, Amman, Mediolan, Warsaw, Krakow, Petra, Boston, Washington DC, Valetta, Prag, Akaba, Marsillia
Cinema: Know how to shoot a film
Other: Have a driving license and can drive a car
